mapper.insert:
insert ignore into urp_class (id, admission_grade, class_num, class_name, academy_name, academy_num, subject_name, subject_num) VALUES
( #{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.admissionGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.classNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.academyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.academyNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.subjectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.subjectNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
